item.title: Qualtrics Data Management
item.description: Before running Formatting the data Setting up Keeping relevant columns Adding more lists Calculating ART Scores Wide to long format Merging with the design (in progress) Exporting to Excel This is for output from Qualtrics that is downloaded in non-legacy format (for scoring on the Author Recognition Task). Before running Before running the Qualtrics survey, make sure to name all your stimuli and corresponding questions so that they are distinguishable from other questions (i.

item.title: New Website
item.description: This website was created using Blogdown in R (and R Markdown). Details on how to create your own can be found here. The repository for my website, along with any R code, can be found on my Github.
